articles.title: Kate Middleton's favourite brand among fashion chains who have set up shop on eBay - Daily Mail
articles.description: LK Bennett, a favourite of Kate Middleton, is among some of Britain's best-known clothing retailers who have set up shop on the auction website's brand outlet, reports The Sunday Times.
articles.content:
Fashion brands are flocking to eBay to shift 'dead stock' after their stores were forced to close due to lockdown.

articles.author: David Snelling
articles.title: Alexa is getting smarter, as Amazon reveals new tricks to try with your Echo - Express
articles.description: AMAZON Echo owners are about to see Alexa get a whole lot smarter thanks to a new update from the US retail firm that'll make the chatty assistant better at having real conversations. To test out the smarter Alexa, there are some new tricks to try too.
